desc: Stop the stink before it begins and leave the bathroom smelling better than when you entered. 100% Australian made non-toxic pre poo toilet spray guaranteed to combat the rowdiest of bathroom activity. Leave the bathroom with confidence. Walk don't run.

layout.text:
Stop the Stink
Before it Begins

Before you go toilet spray,
trapping odours in the bowl.
Leave the bathroom with confidence.
Walk, don't run.™
